nodes.text: The Sabre Club was the most lavish and exclusive casino in the Ace of Sabres. It was limited to 999 members who had to pay 25,000 credits for a two-year membership. Each member got a holocard that contained a genetic sample, voice print and retinal scan. It was also embossed with a counterfeit-proof holographic lightsaber design. Entrance to the club was not permitted without this card.

The Sabre Club had a staff of Kubaz chefs which could prepare any meal that was requested. It also had a massive data library for use by patrons. The sitting room included all the modern conveniences. It had a 500-person main banquet hall and was decorated with antiques and artifacts from thousands of worlds. There was a long waiting list for membership.
It was managed by Gandin T'Noull.
